issue.title: [R] Register `nse_funcs` requiring direct mapping (unary & binary)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16890](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16890). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- register each binding with and without the `pkg::` prefix
- add / update unit tests for the `nse_funcs` bindings to include at least one `pkg::fun()` call for each binding
